Package si.ijs.kt.clus.statistic

Class RegressionStat

java.lang.Object
si.ijs.kt.clus.statistic.ClusStatistic
si.ijs.kt.clus.statistic.RegressionStatBase
si.ijs.kt.clus.statistic.RegressionStat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ComponentStatistic
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClusBeamSimRegrStat, GISStat, ILevelCStatistic
public class RegressionStat extends RegressionStatBase implements ComponentStatistic

      The case where are examples have missing value for the i-th attribute, i.e., variance can not be calculated, so it is estimated

    • shouldEstimate

      public boolean shouldEstimate(double k_tot, double n_tot)
      Should the variance be calculated, or estimated (for example if all examples have missing values)
      Parameters:
      k_tot - Total number of examples with non-missing values for i-th attribute
      n_tot - Total number of examples with non-missing values for all attributes

    • getTargetSumWeights

      public double getTargetSumWeights()
      Description copied from class: ClusStatistic
      Provides sum of weights of target attributes
      Overrides:
      getTargetSumWeights in class ClusStatistic
      Returns:
      sum of weights of target attributes, or NaN if statistic doesn't contain target attributes (i.e., unsupervised learning is performed)
